findings.title: approve
findings.description: The approve function has a potential vulnerability.

findings.title: Transfer Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The transfer function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected permit Function
findings.description: The permit function is marked as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The mint function has a vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions were found, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Unprotected Sync Function
findings.description: The 'sync' function does not have any access modifier and can be called by anyone, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: Unprotected Initialize Function
findings.description: The initialize function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized calls.
